com.majeur.preferencekit

Class SeekBarPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • com.majeur.preferencekit.Preference
        • com.majeur.preferencekit.SeekBarPreference

  • public class SeekBarPreference
extends Preference
    Preference that allows user to input an value through a SeekBar.
